rain.000:
I love it when it rains. Nature is washing itself off!
		$h#$e#
woods.000:
The path to the Rejuvenating Forest is this way!
			$0#$b#Enter the Secret Woods, the entrance to the Rejuvenating Forest should be to the west. 
		$0#$e#
rejuvenatingforest.000:
Welcome to the Rejuvenating Forest!
			$0#$b#As you can see it is quite overrun.
			$0#$b#Travel deep into the forest to find the heart.
			$0#$b#Once you find the heart, return it to my brother.
		$h#$e#
